settings.heading: WATERPROOF
settings.paragraph: Each GOFRANCK has a waterproof coating on the inside of the material, compatible with 20.000 mm column pressure.

settings.heading: BIONIC FINISH®ECO WATER REPELLENT
settings.paragraph: Bionic finish®Eco, is a water repellent component based on a fluorine free recipe. This extra enhancing finish has been added to the waterproof materials so that raindrops simply glide off the jacket.

settings.heading: TAPED SEAMS
settings.paragraph: All seams are hermetically heat-taped. This sealing Technique ensures no rain can penetrate through the seams.

settings.heading: DUPONT™ SORONA® BIODEGRADABLE INSULATION
settings.paragraph: Our padded styles have Sorona® fibre filling by DuPont™, a plant-based insulation with high performance qualities. This biodegradable filling givestremendous warmth, is animal (cruelty) free, moisture wicking, washable and stays in shape.

settings.heading: WATERPROOF ZIPPERS
settings.paragraph: When exposed to the elements waterproof zippers are applied. These reversed coil zippers are enhanced with a TPU coating.

settings.heading: BREATHABLE
settings.paragraph: Our materials have a vapor permeability up to 8.000 g/m2. The inner waterproof coating blocks out outside moisture and wind whilst letting through the bodies own vapour to regulate heat.

settings.heading: WINDPROOF
settings.paragraph: All materials are windproof, thus not allowing wind to enter or move through the garment.

settings.heading: CYCLING FEATURES
settings.paragraph: Find the signature GOFRANCK BIKE WINGS in some of the styles. These canbe used when out on the bike to give your legs more coverage from the rain. When not in use simply button backtill needed.

settings.heading: MODULAR FEATURES
settings.paragraph: Some GOFRANCK styles can be adapted to complement your exact needs and theforecast. Modular styles will feature a seperate hat or hood for a full waterproof look.

settings.heading: REFLECTIVE VISIBILITY STRIP
settings.paragraph: Each GOFRANCK style features a barely-there welted pocket on the backside of the garment, which conceals a fixed Reflective Visibility Strip. Wear the strip outside of the pocket during moments when extra visibility is of essence. Easily store the Reflective Visibility Strip in the pocket when not needed.
